OmopDatasets 0.1.0

Helper for consistent documentation of schemas.

schemasDoc.Rd

Helper for consistent documentation of schemas.

Arguments

cdmSchema

A string that indicates the cdm schema.

cdmPrefix

A string that prefixes the tables in the cdm schema.

writeSchema

A string that indicates the write schema.

writePrefix

A string that prefixes the tables in the write schema.

Developed by Martí Català.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
